explains: n. 虔诚；宗教狂；虚伪信仰

sentences.en: Religiosity is a very uncomfortable feeling.
sentences.cn: 极端的虔诚是一种并不舒适的感受。

sentences.en: Who are we trying to impress in our religiosity?
sentences.cn: 我们这么虔诚是要给谁好印象呢﹖我们自己？

sentences.en: That religiosity later hardened into a fanatical hatred.
sentences.cn: 这种虔诚后来凝固成了一种强烈的仇恨。
